dialogues.text: Dr. Evil hits a SELF-DESTRUCT button. An ALARM blares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warning! Self-destruct sequence  initiated!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The base is rocked by EXPLOSIONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See, Dr. Evil I told you I could do  both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps you spoke too soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin looks over. Felicity has slumped over in the tube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noooooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin BANGS on the glass with his fists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felicity! Felicity. Wake up! Wake  up! Please God, don't take her away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is too late. Dr. Evil runs through the TIME PORTAL and gets away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felicity, you have to understand, I  thought I had my mojo back.  This  isn't fair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin looks up to the heavens. We see a quick--

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: of moments they shared, Austin making her laugh, their fi kiss, of Felicity being her beautiful and free-spirited s A tear runs down his cheek. Austin presses his face again the glass as if trying to reach her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you, Felicity! I know I  couldn't say it before, but I really  do love you! (enraged) Dr. Evil, I'll kill him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin starts to chase him, but THREE PRIVATE ARMY MEN bl his path. Austin is like an animal. He charges toward the first soldier, RIPS HIS HEART OUT, takes a bite out of it. Then Austin turns to the second soldier and RIPS HIS SPIN OUT like in Mortal Kombat. The soldier slumps to the grou The last soldier is terrified. Austin swings both fists  simultaneously, crushing the guy's head which EXPLODES LI A PUMPKIN. Austin runs over to the TIME PORTAL set for "75 BC". He r through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An orgy is taking place. Dr. Evil is in a toga with a lau with two YOUNG ROMAN MEN feeding him grapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You make love to your wife out of  duty, your mistress for pleasure,  and a Roman boy for ecstasy. (noticing Austin) Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs away as Austin appears through the TIME PORTAL. A follows Dr. Evil into another TIME PORTAL marked "1975".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin emerges from the TIME PORTAL to see Dr. Evil getti into a car. Austin waves his hands and a 1974 RED FORD TO with a white stripe pulls over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to commandeer this vehicle. (noticing) Hey, aren't you Hutch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see PAUL MICHAEL GLASER (STARSKY).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Starsky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Hutch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin jumps in and the Torino speeds off. Dr. Evil's car disappears into a car wash which is a TIME PORTAL. The To follows. A sign at the car wash reads: "1911"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passengers in period garb walk past a lifesaver with "Tit stenciled above it. Dr. Evil enters through a portal with Austin hot on his heels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Iceberg, dead ahead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the ship tilts at a radical angle. LEONARDO DICA KATE WINSLET, and JAMES CAMERON slide by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm king of the world!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Evil and Austin slide backwards into the TIME PORTAL  they just came from.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Evil runs into the street with Austin chasing him. In SLO-MO Austin dives for a ridiculously long time, and TAC Dr.  Evil, pinning him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to kill you, you bastard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (breathing heavily) Before you do that, know this: Austin,  I am... your... father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I can't back that up. I was just  grasping at straws. I had nothing.  But isn't it interesting, Mr. Powers,  you really have become a product of  the Nineties.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're more interested in your job  as glorified policeman than you are  in love. You won the battle, but I  won the war. Love means nothing,  you've proved it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't think that Felicity was  going to die, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a cowardly response. I'm  disappointed really. You have the  power to go back in time and save  her, but it means letting me go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin looks over and sees a TIME PORTAL. Through it he c glimpse the lair, and Felicity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Mr. Powers, which is it going  to be? Me or the girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felicity!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin runs through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the scene from a moment ago. Felicity is in the gl tube and the BRIGHTLY COLORED GAS is starting to fill it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like you have a choice:  save the world, or save your  girlfriend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I choose love, baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin runs over to the glass tube and SMASHES HIS FIST  through it. The glass SHATTERS and Austin pulls Felicity  out. She gasps for air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felicity, I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (breathless) But I thought-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was another place and another  time, baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin kisses her for a long time. She starts to twitch. She struggles. She hits him in the head and he finally st kissing her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasping) Can't. Breathe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, baby, I got a little over-  stimulated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fire the laser!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use your mojo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me, you do!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin turns and gives a 'who me?' look over his bottom. woman arming the laser stumbles backwards into the direct control just as it FIRES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Big Boy Rocket spins to avoid the laser as it passes  harmlessly by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jubilation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He did it, he saved the world! (calming down) Of course, I thought he might.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin, you did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-oh. (beat) I think I just got my mojo back.  Really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Austin, you had it all along. No one  can take your, mojo away from you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good-bye, Mr. Powers, for the last  time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Evil hits the SELF-DESTRUCT button and climbs aboard rocket, which blasts off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Evil's escape rocket in flight.

dialogues.speaker: FULL SCREEN
dialogues.text: Dr. Evil's rocket enters the screen. It has the silhouett of a flying penis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, you better have a look at this  radar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: don't know, sir. It's hard to  describe.  It's... it's-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a little prick!
